 They seem to be all over the sound chip, so it must be important. I almos=
t never get technical advice. 'Used As Exactly Standard Into Unit-That'd Be=
 Wonderful-(sight-card{Blind Aide?})--Realtime English-Certain Contact'. I =
think it means to not use the random pulses, that would just confuse the ch=
ip, it'll have to be provided with random words( the numbers). Great, load =
all those numbers into a register/memory, and then use a pic chip, or basic=
 stamp to output them randomly to the Speakjet--simple!  I sent this the Sp=
eakjet group too! that oughta make some brianiacs heads cock sideways! Espe=
cially since one thier names was mentioned!    Frank-S
